card.title: Most likely to vote the same

info.lead: List of 5 MPs that most often vote the same as the selected member. MPs are ranked ascending. The higher the value, the bigger the commonalities between the two MPs.
text: We calculate {link} between the results of MPs' votes and the results of everyone else while we transform the votes into numerical values between -1 and 1.
Ko izračunamo "razdaljo" med vsemi poslanci, jih razvrstimo glede na rezultat in prikažemo prvih pet.
